messages.message: Sorry for not circling back on this earlier, didn't have a chance to read the PR. In order for py unit tests to be picked up, you need to follow the file structure where the test files live under /test/unit/py/... this is how the script detects python unit test code.
You should also follow the same Makefile patterns in other python files as well, don't override them unless there is a good reason to do so.
